淨係整pcb?
電路果啲

replies.msg: 你選錯科？ eletonic 會正確d.
去華強北坐返357年應該得

如果整pcb應該讀細電

以前聽professor講
大電 [electrical] => 整電力果邊多 即係電力供應 條電線幾大先夠過電之類
細電 [electronic] => 主要會掂signal e.g. AMFM / communication / signal processing等等


樓主想整舊咁既野首先要學識 V=IR
如果係想自製DAC/hifi之類要學ADC transistor等等電子野既原理
practical最基本要識點揸辣雞

真係對電路果方面有興趣可以試下arduino+麵包板玩下
就算得中學知識都玩得起

如果要講exactly讀咩topic
睇圖舊野有晒ic cap 應該係會有digital signal
Intro phy
basic circuit analysis
circuit design同signal processing 點都走唔甩
理論要知各種component係點work
實幹要識soldering 同畫電路圖

replies.msg:
Electrical engineering has now subdivided into a wide range of subfields including electronics, digital computers, computer engineering, power engineering, telecommunications, control systems, robotics, radio-frequency engineering, signal processing, instrumentation, and microelectronics. Many of these subdisciplines overlap with other engineering branches, spanning a huge number of specializations such as hardware engineering, power electronics, electromagnetics & waves, microwave engineering, nanotechnology, electrochemistry, renewable energies, mechatronics, electrical materials science, and much more.

source: IEEE https://tryengineeringinstitute.ieee.org/what-is-electrical-engineering-anyway/

大電細電係old-fashioned terms.EE develop到而家,根本就冇所謂既大細電之分,北美同全球好多地方都冇再分大細電,一律係叫electrical engineering.

replies.msg:
都就黎叫CS啦，仲電乜鬼
而家EE Grad School最熱門既field就係Signal Processing同Computer Engineering

大把research group掛EE頭賣CS肉

淨係做IC design（真係負責design）都基本要phd + 最好有篇isscc or 差唔多級數既paper已經嚇走一堆人
